comment: 2-oxoglutarate dehydrogenase complex: pyruvate dehydrogenase (see R01699) second step of two-step reaction (R01699 or R00014+R03270) following after R00014
definition: 2-(alpha-Hydroxyethyl)thiamine diphosphate + Enzyme N6-(lipoyl)lysine <=> [Dihydrolipoyllysine-residue acetyltransferase] S-acetyldihydrolipoyllysine + Thiamin diphosphate

orthologs.K00161: pyruvate dehydrogenase E1 component alpha subunit [EC:1.2.4.1]
orthologs.K00162: pyruvate dehydrogenase E1 component beta subunit [EC:1.2.4.1]
